#Roadmap

##v1.0.0
This maintains the historical API but allows for composer autoloading.

- [x] Composer support.
- [x] PSR2 bar class names.
- [x] Migrate tests to PHPUnit.


##v2.0.0
The historical API will be broken by classname changes.

- [x] Introduce namespacing.
- [x] PSR4 autoloading.
- [x] Automated testing.
- [x] PHP 5.4 minimum.
